content:
Hi - I just tried downloading the definitions.json for nzbase v 1.0.0 (https://fhir.org.nz/ig/base/index.html) and the zip file is invalid. It is working fine for the CI build - http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7NZ/nzbase/branches/master/extensions.html (support-> Artifacts(Json))

I'm downloading this manually because I haven't been able to get a sushi-config to download it automatically e.g.

dependencies:
hl7.org.nz.fhir.ig.base:
#uri: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7NZ/nzbase/branches/master
uri: https://fhir.org.nz/ig/base
version: 1.0.0

Does anyone know is there a sushi config I can use to get the 1.0.0 release?

cheers

Pat
I'll look into that. In the meantime, here's the github repo: https://github.com/HL7NZ/nzbase/ which you can download and build locally.
